NK040(thi)034:1: // lhag ma byin gyis rlabs pa ni /
NK040(thi)034:2: lhag ma la chang dang kha khru btab la /
NK040(thi)034:3: swa b+ha was stong par sbyongs /
NK040(thi)034:4: b+h+r+aum las rin po che'i snod kyi nang du lhag
NK040(thi)034:5: gtor 'dod yon gyi longs spyod phun sum tshogs par
NK040(thi)034:6: gyur / a ka ros brlab la /
NK040(thi)034:8: rdo rje rtse lnga'i rgya bcas la /
NK040(thi)034:10: dzahmh'u bam hoh sa ma ya phem phem /
NK040(thi)034:11: ta ka ra tsa ya dza dzah ad ka ta ya /
NK040(thi)034:24: sarba d+h+aak+ki ni nan h+r+aihd ya h'u phata /
NK040(thi)034:25: de nas mchod cing phrin las bcol ba ni /
NK040(thi)034:26: h'u h+r+aih rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i bka' nyan las byed tshogs //
NK040(thi)034:27: rigs bzhi mkha' 'gro shugs 'gro 'khor dang bcas //
NK040(thi)034:28: dbang phyug nyer brgyad mkha' 'gro sum cu gnyis //
NK040(thi)034:29: ging chen bco brgyad lang ka dur khrod bdag ma bdun sring bzhi 'bar ma lnga bcu brgyad //
NK040(thi)034:30: drug cu rtsa bzhi 'bum phrag mkha' 'gro'i tshogs //
NK040(thi)034:31: gang bcol thog med phrin las sgrub mdzad pa'i //
NK040(thi)034:32: bstan ma bcu gnyis sde brgyad 'khor dang bcas //
NK040(thi)034:33: bka' yi pham phab lhag gtor 'di longs la //
NK040(thi)034:34: zhi rgyas dbang drag 'gugs 'dren mnan gzir sogs //
NK040(thi)034:35: ci ltar bcol pa'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod //
NK040(thi)034:37: de nas gtsog lhag 'bru gsum gyis byin gyis brlab la /
